response.overview: Sebastian has been driving these city streets since forever, but he knows he's going nowhere. It's the only thing he does anymore - that and watching movies, they're the only thing he enjoys.  But when Kali enters his taxi, he soon warms to their conversation. Tipsy, tired, and lost in nostalgia, all her recent memories seem to elude her. Instead, the discussion veers off to childhood, friendship, death and the meaning of happiness.  For Kali, this was the night of her 'going-away' party, and moving on from the people she loves ignites a retrospection that might even change how Sebastian views himself. How do you see the beauty in the stars when they're all the way up there?  "People come and go, it happens to everybody."
response.tagline: When two people are put together for a certain amount of time, they do get to know each other
response.title: Light Pollution
